info.title: DEV01 Information Request REST
info.description: REST API specifications for Information Retrieval and Command Service.

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: When set to true, the service will return all the records for member companies

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: When set to true, downloads the companies.xml file

parameters.name: cocodes
parameters.description: To retrieve company-specific records; this parameter can take a comma separated list

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: To retrieve the company records, which were updated on or after given date

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: To retrieve the company records, which were updated on or before the given date

200.description: A list of companies with subsidiaries and program info

application/xml.example: ALPHA INSURANCE CO true 04513 true 2024-02-13T16:43:30.000 ALPHA INSURANCE OF FLORIDA true true 2022-12-06T18:20:00.000 0002 true 2017-01-17T00:00:00.000 Automobile A true 2006-01-01T00:00:00.000 Medpay M true 2006-01-01T00:00:00.000

parameters.name: all
parameters.description:
When set to “true”, the service will return all the records for the supported evidence 
types under all the domains.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description:
When setting the value to the valid domain name, the service will return all the 
records for the supported evidence types under the given domain.

get.description: Returns a list of supported file types and their associated mime types.

parameters.name: all
parameters.description: When set to "true", the service will return all the records for the supported MIME types.

200.description: A list of supported mime types in XML format

get.description: Returns a list of Settlement Exchange System companies with applications and subsidiaries.

200.description: A detailed demand object with party, policy, and incident info

application/xml.example: <af:Demand xmlns:af="http://dint.arbfile.org/standard/v1"> <af:DemandId>527921</af:DemandId> <af:DemandStatus>Issued</af:DemandStatus> <af:CaseVersion>DhzHOb/Q0i6krwP2erP6Ow==</af:CaseVersion> <af:AssociatedDemands/> <af:Incident> <af:IncidentState>FL</af:IncidentState> <af:IncidentDate>2025-05-08</af:IncidentDate> </af:Incident> <af:DemandParties> <af:DemandParty> <af:Role>Demander</af:Role> <af:Company> <af:Cocode>04513</af:Cocode> <af:Subsid>0002</af:Subsid> <af:Name>ALPHA INSURANCE OF FLORIDA</af:Name> </af:Company> </af:DemandParty> <!-- additional DemandParty entries --> </af:DemandParties> <af:DemanderDetails> <af:ClaimPolicyNumber>sjr202505080206-alpha</af:ClaimPolicyNumber> <af:Remittance/> <af:Insured> <af:PersonName> <af:LastName>REECE</af:LastName> </af:PersonName> <af:Type>Personal</af:Type> <af:IsDriver>false</af:IsDriver> </af:Insured> <!-- additional DemanderDetails info --> </af:DemanderDetails> <!-- ResponderDetails, Negotiations, etc. --> </af:Demand>

200.description: Successful response returning document in binary.

DemandStatus.description: Current status of the demand (e.g., Issued, Accepted)

AssociatedDemands.description: List or references to related demands

IncidentState.description: State in which the incident occurred

Incident.description: Information about the incident that led to the demand

Role.description: Role of the party (e.g., Demander, Responder)

DemandParty.description: Details about one party in the demand

DemandParties.description: List of parties involved in the demand

ClaimPolicyNumber.description: Policy number associated with the claim

IsDriver.description: Whether the insured was the driver

DemanderDetails.description: Details about the demander side of the claim

ClaimPolicyNumber.description: Policy number associated with the claim

IsDriver.description: Whether the insured was the driver

ResponderDetails.description: Details about the responder side of the claim

TotalLoss.description: Indicates if the vehicle is a total loss

Message.description: Message or notes related to the negotiation

DomainType.description: Represents the domain type such as E-SUBROHUB, TRS, etc.

DocumentType.description: Represents the domain type such as E-SUBROHUB, TRS, etc.

Type.description: Represents the file type such as text, image, audio, and video.

Active.description: Indicates if the file type is active or inactive.

MaxSize.description: Maximum size supported for particular file types in bytes.

FileType.description: Object representation of a File Type

MimeType.description: Lists suppored MIME type, i.e., application/pdf

SESCompany.description: The Settlement Exchange System Comapany's Name.

SESCompanies.description: Collection of Settlement Exchange System Companies

SESApplications.description: Collection of Settlement Exchange System Applications.

SESSubsidiary.description: Object representation of a Settlement Exchange System Subsidiary

SESSubsidiaries.description: Collection of Settlement Exchange System Subsidiaries

Name.description: This is the name of a company

Active.description: Indicates if the Company is active or inactive.

Cocode.description: A unique identifier that identifies the company (this field will eventually become obsolete)

LiabilityCoverage.description: A Boolean to determine if the company is set up to accept liability.

UpdatedDate.description: The date the Subsidiary record was modified.

Name.description: The Settlement Exchange System Comapany's Name.

SESCompany.description: Object representation of a Settlement Exchange System Company.

Name.description: The name of the SES Application.

Subsid.description: An identifier that combined with the cocode identifies the subsidiary.

SESSubsidiary.description: Object representation of a Settlement Exchange System Subsidiary

Name.description: This is the name of the Subsidiary.

Active.description: Indicates if the Subsidiary is active or inactive.

LiabilityCoverage.description: A Boolean to determine if the Subsidiary is set up to accept liability.

UpdatedDate.description: The date the subsidiary record was modified.

Subsid.description: An identifier that combined with the cocode identifies the subsidiary.

RequesterGuid.description: An identifier that is unique for the member.

HandlingCocode.description: The identifier given to a third-party administrator (TPA) that identifies them to Arbitration Forums.

SubjectCocode.description: The identifier given to the member that identifies them to Arbitration Forums.

SubjectClaimNumber.description: The claim number that the demand is associate to.

Source.description: An xml structure that contains the information about the member who is sending the command.

ArbitrationCommand.description: A command used by the demander to initiate arbitration in the Total Recovery System (TRS) by using the details of a specific Demand Id in E-Subro Hub.
